story.text: [[Tesla Tower]] was patented and the patent is now expired.[http://getcorp.com/ Global Energy Transmission] is working on a modern day Tesla Tower. [https://docs.google.com/viewer?url=patentimages.storage.googleapis.com/pdfs/US1119732.pdf View the expired patent here.]
[http://www.transatomicpower.com/ Transatomic Power] is working on removing waste product. The main question for them is permitting time.
